revised_title: On the Attraction and Repulsion of Electric Conductors and the Direction of Molecular Structure
tldr: The author conducts an experiment to determine whether attractions and repulsions between electric conductors are between the currents or the substances conveying them. The results show that the attractions and repulsions are between the substances, not the currents. This conclusion has implications for our understanding of molecular changes in bodies due to electric currents and magnetism.
